hero.title: Intelligent Waste Collection
hero.subtitle: Revolutionizing urban waste management in the Cali River and Boulevard area with smart technology for a cleaner and more sustainable future.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.subtitle: Improper Waste Management
problem.description: Urban areas face significant challenges with waste management, including:

challenges.3: Poor waste segregation leading to contamination

solutions.title: Possible Solutions
solutions.description: We have explored multiple approaches to address the problem of waste accumulation on Boulevard del Río and pollution of the Cali River. Below are the most promising solutions:

1.title: SEABIN - Floating waste collector
1.description: The SEABIN is a collection system designed to remove solid waste and floating fats from bodies of water.

2.title: Transformation of plastics into energy
2.description: This method converts non-biodegradable plastic waste into formic acid, a chemical compound with applications in the generation of electricity for thermal plants and automobiles.

3.title: Smart waste bins with sensors
3.description: Smart waste bins optimise urban waste management through fill level sensors and automatic compaction.

chosenSolution.title: Our Solution
chosenSolution.subtitle: Smart Trash Bins with Automatic Classification
chosenSolution.description: After extensive research and testing, we've developed an intelligent waste collection system centered around smart bins that automatically classify and compact waste.

benefits.1: Automatic waste classification using AI and sensors
benefits.2: Real-time fill level monitoring and alerts
benefits.5: Reduced collection frequency and operational costs

map.title: Collection Points
map.description: Our smart bins are strategically placed throughout the city for maximum efficiency. Explore the map to find the nearest collection point.

team.title: Development Team
team.description: Meet the talented individuals behind our intelligent waste collection initiative.

prototypeGallery.title: Raising awareness
prototypeGallery.description: Sensor-equipped waste bins facilitate the automatic separation of waste, promoting responsible habits in the community. By making recycling more accessible, they foster greater environmental awareness and reduce pollution in these urban spaces.

1.title: United for a Clean Boulevard
1.description: Volunteers and citizens gather to collect waste and keep the Boulevard del Río a clean and pleasant space for everyone.

2.title: Rescuing the Beauty of the Boulevard
2.description: With bags and gloves in hand, residents and tourists work together to remove waste and preserve the iconic image of the Boulevard del Río.

3.title: Small Actions, Big Impact
3.description: Families and friends participate in an ecological initiative by collecting waste and promoting recycling in one of the most emblematic places in Cali.

4.title: Cali is greener and more sustainable
4.description: A committed community shows that with effort and environmental awareness it is possible to transform the Boulevard del Río into an example of sustainability.

5.title: Guardians of the Environment in Cali
5.description: A group of young people committed to the planet organize clean-up days to reduce pollution in the heart of the city.

contact.title: Join Our Initiative
contact.description: Help us create a cleaner, more sustainable future. Whether you're a municipality, business, or concerned citizen, we'd love to hear from you.
